providers.title: AI Providers

securityNotice.title: Security Notice
securityNotice.message: Your API keys are stored securely in your browser's local storage:
securityNotice.point1: Keys never leave your browser or device
securityNotice.point2: No data is transmitted to our servers
securityNotice.point3: Clear browser data will remove all stored keys

providers.noProviders: No providers configured. Add one to get started.
providers.noProvidersDescription: Connect your AI providers to start running tests. Your API keys are stored securely in your browser.
providers.apiKeyHint: Your API key is stored securely in your browser and never sent to our servers
providers.testFailedMessage: Provider connection test failed. Please check your configuration.
providers.editTypeNotice: Provider type cannot be changed when editing
providers.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
providers.name: Name
providers.baseUrlHint: Custom API endpoint (leave empty for default)
providers.modelsHint: Enter one model per line. Leave empty to use provider defaults.

runs.title: Test Runs
